name: Unicorn Milk Clone
description: From @cutwoodspy on http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/255064/INTERNAL+LEAK+OF+CUTWOOK+UNICORN+MILK, a posted leaked recipe confirmed by enyawreklaw. I just wanted a copy here for my personal ease of access and in case others wanted same. Details are per enyawreklaw's conments on OP.
author: coilspotting

reviews.text: Confirmed by Enyawrecklaw that he was a fraud. I quote, "FUCK CUTTWOOD SPY", from Wayne himself. It was all a scam to get attention to his recipe. https://youtu.be/Bqrqntx-pnc?t=1h26m20s  Here is Enyawrecklaw explaining it all. I have it right where he begins to talk about cuttwood spy. With that said, it's still a banging recipe. UPDATE- I mixed this, and something tastes off. I have to figure out what it is.
